items.sentence: I think you\'ll have very little difficulty in getting a driver\'s license.
Why does Tom always seem to like doing things that make other people angry?
You should tell Tom that Mary would prefer it if he would quit calling her.
I have a nice pair of shoes that are too small for me. Would you like them?
I don\'t have enough money, so I couldn\'t go with you even if I wanted to.
I just want to let you know that I can\'t attend this afternoon\'s meeting.
We could see the flames coming toward us, so we ran in the other direction.
I think it\'s unlikely that any store would sell this model for that price.
I\'ve already told Tom I plan on staying in Boston for another three weeks.
I thought you said you wanted to know who Tom was planning to do that with.
